cotterpin

Interface Blueprint<T,S extends Blueprint<T,S>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - built type
    S - self type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Blueprint.Child<T,U,P,S>, Blueprint.Mutator<T,U,P,S>, Blueprint.Root<T,S>

    public interface Blueprint<T,S extends Blueprint<T,S>>
    Blueprint for an object graph.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Blueprint.Child<T,U,P extends Blueprint<U,P>,S extends Blueprint.Child<T,U,P,S>>
      Blueprint for an object subordinate to the graph root.
      static interface  Blueprint.IntoMap<K,V,U,P extends Blueprint<U,P>>
      Fluent step for map insertion.
      static interface  Blueprint.Mutator<T,U,P extends Blueprint<U,P>,S extends Blueprint.Mutator<T,U,P,S>>
      Blueprint for a child "component" which may be an object that already exists on the parent.
      static interface  Blueprint.Root<T,S extends Blueprint.Root<T,S>>
      Root Blueprint type.
